alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 07 at 7:17PM PDT until June 08 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast and Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range
